de.vinado.boot.secrets

Class EnvironmentSecretsPropertyEnvironmentPostProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.vinado.boot.secrets.SecretsEnvironmentPostProcessor
      • de.vinado.boot.secrets.EnvironmentSecretsPropertyEnvironmentPostProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.boot.env.EnvironmentPostProcessor, Ordered

    public final class EnvironmentSecretsPropertyEnvironmentPostProcessor
extends SecretsEnvironmentPostProcessor
implements Ordered
    An environment post-processor that resolves every environment variable with a _FILE suffix.
    Author:
    Vincent Nadoll
